metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2122 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: DOS / potential heap overwrite in qtdemux using zlib decompression. Integeroverflow in qtdemux element in qtdemux_inflate function which causes asegfault, or could cause a heap overwrite, depending on libc and OS.Depending on the libc used, and the underlying OS capabilities, it could bejust a segfault or a heap overwrite.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openjfx package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
